author: Bojan Pancevski
title: Inside Sweden's Radically Different Approach...
description: Inside Sweden's Radically Different Approach... (Third column, 14th story, link ) Related stories: Crowds pack in to see Navy hospital ship in NYC... 'Can my husband see his mistress?': French police receive bizarre lockdown questions... Hungary's Orban gets …
content:
The ski pistes are open, the restaurants are doing ample business and the malls are awash with shoppers.
Welcome to Sweden, the last holdout among the small number of Western countries to have taken a radically different approach to the coronavirus pandemic.… [+94 chars]
